snippet: In “The Perfect Family,” Kathleen Turner plays a homemaker up for her parish’s Catholic Woman of the Year award while contending with her gay daughter and adulterous son.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews movie The Perfect Family, directed by Anne Renton and starring Kathleen Turner. Photo (M)0
lead_paragraph: ''You're living in sin,'' declares Eileen Cleary (Kathleen Turner), a devout Roman Catholic mother, to her lesbian daughter, Shannon (Emily Deschanel), in ''The Perfect Family.'' ''Says who?'' Shannon snaps.

headline.main: Oh, for a Rug to Sweep Secrets Under
